resources.string: Error loading the data. Please check if the device has internet connection

plurals.name: detail_description
plurals.item: Der Club %1$s aus %2$s hat einen Wert von %3$d Million Euro.
Der Club %1$s aus %2$s hat einen Wert von %3$d Millionen Euro.

plurals.name: detail_description_2
plurals.item: %1$s konnte bislang %2$d Sieg auf europäischer Ebene erreichen.
%1$s konnte bislang %2$d Siege auf europäischer Ebene erreichen.

string.name: no_network_connection
string.translation_description: Snackbar message when there is not network connection

string.name: no_network_description
string.translation_description: Message to be shown when user opens the app without any network connection. [CHAR_LIMIT=500]

resources.string:
You seem to be offline, try:

 - Turning off airplane mode

 - Turning on mobile data or Wi-Fi

 - Checking the signal in your area
